        Returns:
        array of random integers of random size

      • getRandomStringArrayOfSizeN

        public static java.lang.String[] getRandomStringArrayOfSizeN(int n)
        Creates an array of a given size with random strings. The strings are hex representation of random integers. May contain duplicates.
        Parameters:
        n - size of array
        Returns:
        array of strings

      • getShuffledStringArrayOfSizeN

        public static java.lang.String[] getShuffledStringArrayOfSizeN(int n)
        Creates an array of a given size with random strings. The strings are hex representation of random integers. Do not contain duplicates.
        Parameters:
        n - size of array
        Returns:
        array of strings
